candidates.name: Pushparani S
candidates.title: Web Developer
candidates.summary: A motivated individual with in-depth knowledge of languages and development tools, seeking a position in a growth-oriented company where I can use my skills to the advantage of the company while having the scope to develop my own skills.
candidates.rawText: Mobile : 8489235259 E-Mail : pushparanis0905@gmail.com Github : github.com/Pushparani S LinkedIn : linkedin.com/in/pushparani-s-1437b1243 Pushparani S Web Developer SUMMARY A motivated individual with in-depth knowledge of languages and development tools, seeking a position in a growth-oriented company where I can use my skills to the advantage of the company while having the scope to develop my own skills. TECHNICAL SKILLS ◆ HTML5 ◆ Laravel ◆ CSS3 ◆ CodeIgniter ◆ JavaScript ◆ MySQL ◆ JQuery JS ◆ REST APIs ◆ PHP ◆ Moodle LMS WORK EXPERIENCE COMPANY: X-MEDIA SOLUTIONS ROLE: WEB DEVELOPER EXPERIENCE : 1 YEAR (September 2022 - PRESENT) PROJECTS: ◆ L&T Workmen Mobilization (web & mobile) - Internal Communication and Worker hiring management App ◆ CDMS Online University (web) - E-Learning Platform ◆ Avtarlabs (web) - E-learning Platform ◆ VRBIZTEC (web) - Engineering Drawings - Viewing Application ◆ Canli (website) - E-commerce Website ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES : ◆ Design and implement database schemas for web applications. This includes creating tables, columns, and relationships, and ensuring that the schema meets the needs of the application. ◆ Integrate payment processing into web applications. This includes working with payment processors, configuring the integration, and testing the integration. ◆ Design and develop REST APIs that meet the needs of clients and users. This includes defining the API's endpoints, parameters, and responses. ◆ Integrate third-party APIs into web applications. This includes understanding the third-party API's Conducted Functional, Regression, Integration and System testing to identify the software defects. EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS BACHELOR DEGREE : B.Sc(Mathematics) - Manonmaniam Sundarnar University(2017-2020). MASTER DEGREE : M.Sc(Mathematics) - Manonmaniam Sundarnar University (2020-2022). COURSES Java (Core Java) : Fita Academy, Chennai.

experience.description: Design and implement database schemas for web applications. Integrate payment processing into web applications. Design and develop REST APIs. Integrate third-party APIs into web applications.

candidates.name: RAMKUMAR B
candidates.summary: Dynamic software developer with over 5 Years 8 Months of proven expertise in web application development. Eagerly pursuing opportunities to leverage my skills for the benefit of your esteemed company while continuously improving my skills in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.
candidates.rawText: RAMKUMAR B Virudhunagar, India 626004 ramki028@gmail.com / 8072205100 WWW: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ramkumar-b-560961177/ SUMMARY Dynamic software developer with over 5 Years 8 Months of proven expertise in web application development. Eagerly pursuing opportunities to leverage my skills for the benefit of your esteemed company while continuously improving my skills in a collaborative and fast-paced environment. SKILLS Programming Languages : PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript Frameworks & Libraries : React, CodeIgniter, Laravel, jQuery, Bootstrap 4 & 5, React Native, Tailwind CSS Databases : MySQL, SQLite Miscellaneous : Git, Linux, Server Handling EXPERIENCE 10/2024 - CurrentSoftware Engineer / iOPEX Technologies - Chennai IQMS – Internal Quality Management System Developed a project management tool to help non-technical stakeholders track quality and process initiatives across departments. Key features: task assignment, milestone tracking, user access, and status dashboards. Food Coupon Management System Built a centralized system for automating food coupon generation, QR-based verification at counters, and integration with attendance to prevent misuse. CDR – Candidate Data Repository Revamped a candidate management portal with AI-driven automation, migrating from PHP to React Redux. Improved the seven-stage form with intelligent autofill, optimizing registration, document handling, and interview scheduling for an efficient HR workflow. Other Projects Contributed to various internal applications at iOPEX Technologies, focusing on process automation, data management, and user experience enhancements. 03/2021 - 10/2024Senior Software Engineer / Nirals Information Technologies - Kovilpatti Eduniv – Comprehensive School and College Management System Led the enhancement of an ERP system used by 250+ institutions to digitalize academic and admin processes. Key features included: Online admission, fee management, and automated payroll. GPS transport tracking and RFID-based

experience.description: Developed a project management tool to help non-technical stakeholders track quality and process initiatives across departments. Built a centralized system for automating food coupon generation, QR-based verification at counters, and integration with attendance to prevent misuse. Revamped a candidate management portal with AI-driven automation, migrating from PHP to React Redux.

Led the enhancement of an ERP system used by 250+ institutions to digitalize academic and admin processes. Developed an e-learning platform to ensure education continuity during the COVID-19 pandemic. Developed a job portal aimed at simplifying recruitment for both candidates and employers.

Contributed to a full-scale healthcare platform that streamlined digital medical services and mobile health tracking. Developed RESTful APIs for mobile application integration, enabling secure communication with patient and doctor interfaces.
Participated in a structured training program and contributed to real-time projects under supervision.

education.university: Sri Vidya College of Engineering & Technology

candidates.name: Vasudevarajan S
candidates.title: Professional
candidates.summary: With 2+ years of multidisciplinary experience in Product, Design and Development, I want to utilize my technical and logical abilities to the fullest extent in order to benefit the organization, while also fostering my own innovative and technical skills Driven by value principles and customer satisfaction, I take a client first approach while not compromising on a smoother execution for the team and quality of the deliverables. Possess a resilient attitude and cool temperament. Flexible team player. Passionate about giving the best design solution, following wire frames & coding practices and giving assurance for best user accessibility and updated designs used.
candidates.rawText: Vasudevarajan S Madurai, India vasudhan13@gmail.com +91-9543828694 PROFILE With 2+ years of multidisciplinary experience in Product, Design and Development, I want to utilize my technical and logical abilities to the fullest extent in order to benefit the organization, while also fostering my own innovative and technical skills Driven by value principles and customer satisfaction, I take a client first approach while not compromising on a smoother execution for the team and quality of the deliverables. Possess a resilient attitude and cool temperament. Flexible team player. Passionate about giving the best design solution, following wire frames & coding practices and giving assurance for best user accessibility and updated designs used. Technical SKILLS : PHP (Basics), Word press. XAMPP Server. FileZilla. Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, GIT. Operating Systems: Microsoft windows platforms. WORK HISTORY The Petal Automations Madurai, TN, India Dec 2022 – Still ROLE: Frontend UI developer  Designed and coded core architecture and systems implementation and integration  Convert PSD Design to HTML & Images should be optimized  Experience with various IDEs such as Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, and notepad++.  Monitored monthly scans to review compliance concerns and submitted status reports  Ensured established internal control procedures meet compliance  Responsible for checking cross browser compatibility and hence worked on different browsers like Safari, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome  Can work under pressure to meet deadlines.  Flexible team player.  Passionate about giving the best design solution, following wireframes & coding practices and giving assurance for best user accessibility and updated designs used.  Implement best practices and refactor code in our team developer base site. Working with the support teams, infrastructure teams and application teams for gathering the statuses to generate monthly reports.

experience.description: Designed and coded core architecture and systems implementation and integration. Convert PSD Design to HTML & Images should be optimized. Experience with various IDEs such as Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, and notepad++. Monitored monthly scans to review compliance concerns and submitted status reports. Ensured established internal control procedures meet compliance. Responsible for checking cross browser compatibility and hence worked on different browsers like Safari, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. Can work under pressure to meet deadlines. Flexible team player. Passionate about giving the best design solution, following wireframes & coding practices and giving assurance for best user accessibility and updated designs used. Implement best practices and refactor code in our team developer base site. Working with the support teams, infrastructure teams and application teams for gathering the statuses to generate monthly reports.

Focuses on, design and builds rich CMS websites and online applications for business. I am working as a Team leader in UI Designing. Engage prospects with product demos and convert them into Customers. Implementing project plans within deadline. Understanding client needs, requirement, and expectation and device solution accordingly. Coordinating client’s needs / enhancements, customization, CMS based issue of clients to provide solutions in adherence to delivery schedules. Coordinating development and reviewing service level targets and ensuring timely Closure of priority assignment. Help and manage my team to achieve target. Ensure smoother communication of project progress with Stakeholders.

projects.name: PHS – Paramount Hospitality Service
projects.description: Involved in developing the components using Bootstrap, HTML 5, and CSS3. Took responsibility with functionality testing and solving browser compatibility issues. Writing code to implement the requirements following the coding standards. Helping team members with their task execution and reviewing their code. Enhanced application by Angular Components based Development in future Angular Framework transitions.

projects.name: Navogo
projects.description: Implemented to HTML5 elements, CSS3, Bootstrap. Creating design and developing HTML5 mockups for design layout. Creating New Web UI Components. Analyze & Debugging the Issues. Guide and Maintain developer team and best Practices. Solving Browser compatibility issues in all major browsers.

projects.name: The Petal Automations – Website
projects.description: Development of web pages using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Jquery. Lead the Complete website. Single handedly worked on the maintenance of those all modules and succeeded in bringing in 100 % customer requirements and satisfaction. Creating design and developing HTML5 mockups for responsive design layout. Uses of media queries to conditionally include CSS rules appropriate for the device screen width and height.

projects.name: The Petal Netalla - Website
projects.description: Development of web pages using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Jquery. Lead the Complete website. Single handedly worked on the maintenance of those all modules and succeeded in bringing in 100 % customer requirements and satisfaction. Creating design and developing HTML5 mockups for responsive design layout. Uses of media queries to conditionally include CSS rules appropriate for the device screen width and height.

projects.name: E-Commerce- Website Development
projects.description: Development of web pages using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, React Js. Integrate front-end application with the application business layer. Creating design and developing HTML5 mockups for design layout. Analyze & Debugging the Issues. Guide and Maintain developer team and best Practices.

workHistory.description: Designed and coded core architecture and systems implementation and integration. Convert PSD Design to HTML & Images should be optimized. Experience with various IDEs such as Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, and notepad++. Monitored monthly scans to review compliance concerns and submitted status reports. Ensured established internal control procedures meet compliance. Responsible for checking cross browser compatibility and hence worked on different browsers like Safari, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. Can work under pressure to meet deadlines. Flexible team player. Passionate about giving the best design solution, following wireframes & coding practices and giving assurance for best user accessibility and updated designs used. Implement best practices and refactor code in our team developer base site. Working with the support teams, infrastructure teams and application teams for gathering the statuses to generate monthly reports.

Focuses on, design and builds rich CMS websites and online applications for business. I am working as a Team leader in UI Designing. Understanding client needs, requirement, and expectation and device solution accordingly. Coordinating client’s needs / enhancements, customization, CMS based issue of clients to provide solutions in adherence to delivery schedules. Coordinating development and reviewing service level targets and ensuring timely Closure of priority assignment. Help and manage my team to achieve target. Ensure smoother communication of project progress with Stakeholders.

experience.description: Designed and coded core architecture and systems implementation and integration. Convert PSD Design to HTML & Images should be optimized. Experience with various IDEs such as Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, and notepad++. Monitored monthly scans to review compliance concerns and submitted status reports. Ensured established internal control procedures meet compliance. Responsible for checking cross browser compatibility and hence worked on different browsers like Safari, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. Can work under pressure to meet deadlines. Flexible team player. Passionate about giving the best design solution, following wireframes & coding practices and giving assurance for best user accessibility and updated designs used. Implement best practices and refactor code in our team developer base site. Working with the support teams, infrastructure teams and application teams for gathering the statuses to generate monthly reports.

Focuses on, design and builds rich CMS websites and online applications for business. I am working as a Team leader in UI Designing. Engage prospects with product demos and convert them into Customers. Implementing project plans within deadline. Understanding client needs, requirement, and expectation and device solution accordingly. Coordinating client’s needs / enhancements, customization, CMS based issue of clients to provide solutions in adherence to delivery schedules. Coordinating development and reviewing service level targets and ensuring timely Closure of priority assignment. Help and manage my team to achieve target. Ensure smoother communication of project progress with Stakeholders.

originalData.rawText: Vasudevarajan S Madurai, India vasudhan13@gmail.com +91-9543828694 PROFILE With 2+ years of multidisciplinary experience in Product, Design and Development, I want to utilize my technical and logical abilities to the fullest extent in order to benefit the organization, while also fostering my own innovative and technical skills Driven by value principles and customer satisfaction, I take a client first approach while not compromising on a smoother execution for the team and quality of the deliverables. Possess a resilient attitude and cool temperament. Flexible team player. Passionate about giving the best design solution, following wire frames & coding practices and giving assurance for best user accessibility and updated designs used. Technical SKILLS : PHP (Basics), Word press. XAMPP Server. FileZilla. Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, GIT. Operating Systems: Microsoft windows platforms. experience.company: Web Digital Mantra It Services Limited
experience.description: Designed and developed web applications using Laravel PHP framework, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Worked on the development of the front-end and back-end of web applications. Created responsive designs that are optimized for desktop and mobile devices. Developed and maintained APIs for mobile and web applications. projects.name: E-commerce website
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website using Laravel, allowing customers to browse and purchase products securely. Implemented features like user registration, product search, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.name: Matrimony platform
projects.description: Created a matrimony platform using Laravel, enabling users to create profiles, search for potential partners, and communicate securely. Implemented advanced search filters, matching algorithms, and privacy settings.

projects.name: Tours and travels website
projects.description: Built a tours and travels website similar to MakeMyTrip using Laravel, providing users with the ability to search and book flights, hotels, and holiday packages. Implemented dynamic pricing, booking management, and integrated third-party APIs.

projects.name: Informative dynamic website
projects.description: Developed an informative dynamic website using Laravel, allowing users to browse and search for articles, news, and resources. Implemented a content management system (CMS) for easy content updates.

projects.name: Temple poojas project
projects.description: Created a temple poojas project using Laravel, where each pooja has different packages based on package prices. Implemented features such as package selection, payment integration, and booking management.

candidates.name: Pushparani S

candidates.summary: A motivated individual with in-depth knowledge of languages and development tools, seeking a position in a growth-oriented company where I can use my skills to the advantage of the company while having the scope to develop my own skills.
candidates.rawText: Mobile : 8489235259 E-Mail : pushparanis0905@gmail.com Github : github.com/Pushparani S LinkedIn : linkedin.com/in/pushparani-s-1437b1243 Pushparani S Web Developer SUMMARY A motivated individual with in-depth knowledge of languages and development tools, seeking a position in a growth-oriented company where I can use my skills to the advantage of the company while having the scope to develop my own skills. TECHNICAL SKILLS ◆ HTML5 ◆ Laravel ◆ CSS3 ◆ CodeIgniter ◆ JavaScript ◆ MySQL ◆ JQuery JS ◆ REST APIs ◆ PHP ◆ Moodle LMS WORK EXPERIENCE COMPANY: X-MEDIA SOLUTIONS ROLE: WEB DEVELOPER EXPERIENCE : 1 YEAR (September 2022 - PRESENT) PROJECTS: ◆ L&T Workmen Mobilization (web & mobile) - Internal Communication and Worker hiring management App ◆ CDMS Online University (web) - E-Learning Platform ◆ Avtarlabs (web) - E-learning Platform ◆ VRBIZTEC (web) - Engineering Drawings - Viewing Application ◆ Canli (website) - E-commerce Website ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES : ◆ Design and implement database schemas for web applications. This includes creating tables, columns, and relationships, and ensuring that the schema meets the needs of the application. ◆ Integrate payment processing into web applications. This includes working with payment processors, configuring the integration, and testing the integration. ◆ Design and develop REST APIs that meet the needs of clients and users. This includes defining the API's endpoints, parameters, and responses. ◆ Integrate third-party APIs into web applications. This includes understanding the third-party API's Conducted Functional, Regression, Integration and System testing to identify the software defects. EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS BACHELOR DEGREE : B.Sc(Mathematics) - Manonmaniam Sundarnar University(2017-2020). MASTER DEGREE : M.Sc(Mathematics) - Manonmaniam Sundarnar University (2020-2022). COURSES Java (Core Java) : Fita Academy, Chennai.

candidates.rawText: SURESH KUMAR EDUCATION B.Sc IT V.H.N.S.N College July 2015 - May 2018 Virudhunagar, Tamilnadu XII K.V.S Hr. Sec. School June 2014 - May 2015 Virudhunagar, Tamilnadu SKILLS ● HTML ● CSS ● Javascript ● Bootstrap ● PHP MVC Framework ● React , Redux ● React Native ● Asp.net Telerik ● Mysql , Sql server, MongoDB , DynamoDB ● AWS , Azure CERTIFICATIONS Completed Certificate course in “Web Development Using PYTHON” Won first prize in web development competition Won second prize in web development competition sureshayyan444@gmail.com 8760105087, 6383470896 Virudhunagar, Tamilnadu LinkedIn SOFTWARE DEVELOPER WORK EXPERIENCE SEPTEMBER 2023 - CURRENT PHP Developer & MERN STACK DEVELOPER R Cloudb software solution pvt ltd | Virudhunagar, Tamilnadu ● HEALTH FUND SYSTEM I developed a system using ASP.NET, Telerik, SQL Server, and AWS to manage personal records, dependent information, job history, comments, address history, and job classes. The system includes features like document uploads, company details, agreements, schedules, and processing screens.AWS for cloud infrastructure and SQL Server for database management. ● CREATIVE DESIGN PACK An eCommerce website developed using React, Redux, and Serverless AWS services like S3 Bucket, DynamoDB, Cognito, Secrets Manager, and CloudFront. The admin allows create users, products, categories, and custom pricing for users. The user side includes login, shopping cart, product browsing, user profile, previous orders, and the ability to reorder. ● BCC ERP Project I developed a system using React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Redux, which includes features such as web login/registration, master pages for city, designation, state, and degree, and client creation for schools with employee mapping across multiple clients. Key modules include a monthly calendar, leave requests, permissions, to-do tasks, payroll, payslips, master and monthly trackers, and employee management ● Magoprinpro & Vindini vysage I developed a system using React, Redux, Mong
